subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Isiah Thomas, the Knicks’ president and coach, received a multiyear extension after James L. Dolan, the chairman of Madison Square Garden, said he saw “evident progress” with the team.
snippet: Isiah Thomas, the Knicks’ president and coach, received a multiyear extension after James L. Dolan, the chairman of Madison Square Garden, said he saw “evident progress” with the team.
